TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DelayedConstraint extends NUnit.Framework.Constraints.PrefixConstraint

Docs.summary: Applies a delay to the match so that a match can be evaluated in the future.

Docs.summary: Test whether the constraint is satisfied by a given value
Docs.returns: True for if the base constraint fails, false if it succeeds
